column5: Beautiful, clean, private, modern duplex-like studio apartment in South Austin with private bedroom and bathroom. 2 separated twin beds across the room from one another. Separated beds are suitable for friends or if couples would like they can push the beds together. The apartment is connected to our home with its own private front entrance. About 7 miles to downtown, 9 miles to ACL Fest, 8 miles to Austin-Bergstrom Airport. Kitchenette with mini-fridge & microwave.
